trans-unit.source: Converts the members of an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] characters to and from instances of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Converteert de leden van een <xref:System.Collections.IList>verzameling [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tekens naar en van exemplaren van <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The converted <xref:System.String> is a concatenated list of all the characters in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: De geconverteerde <xref:System.String>is een samengevoegde lijst van alle tekens in de <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This class is only intended to be used by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Deze klasse is alleen bedoeld voor gebruik door de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>voor serialisatie van [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Converters.CharIListConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Converters.CharIListConverter"> </xref> klasse.
